description: This table contains the listing the mapping all of COSMIC's legacy mutations(COSMs) to the new genomic identifiers(COSVs). This file also helps to identify the transcripts and the accession numbers on which the current mutation is annotated on, along with the mutation type.

fields.name: IS_CANONICAL
fields.description: To indentify the transcript, if it is a canonical transcript the column value would be a yes otherwise a no.

fields.name: ACCESSION_NUMBER
fields.description: The transcript identifier of the gene.

fields.name: GENE_NAME
fields.description: The gene name for which the data has been curated in COSMIC. In most cases this is the accepted HGNC identifier.
